properties.description: The cabin above Urner Meiental is truly family-friendly: the access trails are designed as dwarf trails! The environs offer several climbing parks with climbs up to 6th grade, some of them especially equipped for children. The flying fox and Sewensee with a small rowboat are additional attractions. Alpine hikers and climbers find satisfying possibilities as well. The cabin is suited for training courses.
